Member Login Home About the Club Meet the Staff Mission & Vision Membership Membership Inquiry form Golf Golf FAQ Scorecard Course Tour Tennis Events Weddings Private Events Meetings Request More Info Lifestyle Dining Sally 2025 Sally 2025 Sally Tournament Calendar of Events 2025 SALLY FAQ 2025 SALLY Program Book Email the Sally The Sally Facebook Page Guest Information Contact & Directions Menu Home About the Club Meet the Staff Mission & Vision Membership Membership Inquiry form Golf Golf FAQ Scorecard Course Tour Tennis Events Weddings Private Events Meetings Request More Info Lifestyle Dining Sally 2025 Sally 2025 Sally Tournament Calendar of Events 2025 SALLY FAQ 2025 SALLY Program Book Email the Sally The Sally Facebook Page Guest Information Contact & Directions Login Membership Oceanside membership is exclusive and rewarding. The superb facilities and central location suit our members comfort and convenience. The staff is trained to pamper the membership through quality products and personal service. We are dedicated to providing our members and their personal guests a broad based and fulfilling recreational and social experience. You're not just a member; you're family. YOU DESERVE IT! Now is the time to take advantage of an exceptional opportunity to join Oceanside Country Club. The Club offers an extraordinary golfing experience and best in the area tennis and pool amenities. But, what we hear about most is the friendliness and camaraderie of our Members. Come be part of our family... Club Amenities Beautifully maintained, 18-hole private course No tee time policy, play at your own pace and on your time schedule Full service, pristine 290-yard driving range, sand trap and chipping area with two large putting greens Extensive lesson programs and clinics are available for novice and junior golfers Fully equipped tennis and golf pro shops off offering the latest in apparel, accessories and equipment Nine (9) lighted, Har-Tru clay tennis courts Men's and Women's GVTL teams, junior programs for all ages and daily round-robins 5,000 square foot ballroom with spectacular views Year-round calendar of dining and social events that cater to every interest Formal main dining room featuring elegant decor and award winning cuisine Spacious pool featuring poolside dining Summer Children's Camp in June, July and August offering crafts, field trips, golf lessons, and tennis clinics Host of the Annual Women's South Atlantic Amateur Championship (The Sally) Full Membership Full Members enjoy the use of the golf, tennis, pool and social facilities of the Club. Golf requires no tee times and Members are not required to pay greens fees or court fees but will be required to pay golf cart fees. Members are eligible and encouraged to play in all Club-sponsored tournaments and events. Members have voting privileges and may hold office and serve on Member committees. Tennis Membership Tennis Members are entitled to use all the tennis facility, plus the pool dining and social facilities of the Club. Golf privileges may be enjoyed 4 times per year by paying the applicable guest fees. Members are not permitted to play in major Club sponsored golf tournaments and events. Members with certificates have voting privileges and may hold office and serve on member committees. Junior Membership Junior Memberships are available to those Members up to the age of 40. Members will receive reduced dues until reaching their 40th birthday and will then pay the current dues then in effect for Full Membership. Junior Members enjoy the use of the golf, tennis, pool & social facilities of the Club. Golf requires no tee times and Members are not required to pay greens fees or court fees but will be required to pay golf cart fees. Members are eligible and encouraged to play in all Club-sponsored tournaments and events. Members with a certificate have voting privileges and may hold office and serve on Member committees. For more information or to schedule a club tour please contact: Kelly Lawrence, Director of Membership & Catering by clicking on the Membership Inquiry link to request rates. We promise to go above and beyond to personally take care of you and your guests to ensure that you feel welcomed and satisfied. Whether you are planning a wedding, baby shower, meeting, birthday party, golf outing or rehearsal dinner, you will be taken care of by our experienced staff. Our goal is to make planning your event as easy as possible for you and to make you feel like a guest at your own event. Click Here to email for information, or call us Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Member login Careers Contact Us Oceanside Country Club | 75 North Halifax Drive, Ormond Beach, FL 32176 | Ph: 386-677-7200 © , All Rights Reserved. The Club is designed to host parties from 25 attendees up to gatherings of 200. Specializing in weddings, bar/bat mitzvahs, bridal or baby showers, and anniversary or birthday parties, the Club’s varied menu offerings are sure to make your event exceptional. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: If business is on the agenda for the day, the staff at the Club is able to arrange seating and audio visual equipment for your next corporate meeting or function. Make it a meeting no one will want to miss at Oceanside Country Club. Please contact us to set up a tour and discuss your next gathering at Oceanside Country Club. You can contact our Director of Catering, Kelly Lawrence at [email protected] We look forward to seeing you at the Club! Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Weddings Weddings Imagine the wedding of your dreams at Oceanside Country Club. With our picturesque landscape, gorgeous clubhouse, experienced staff and exquisite cuisine, Oceanside is the perfect location for you. We make planning your wedding as easy as possible and we will happily customize a package to fit your needs. Our dedicated and experienced catering team will guide you through the planning process to ensure that your wedding day is flawless. We are also able and available to coordinate your wedding to make sure you don't have to worry about a thing on your big day. We will ensure that your wedding is an unforgettable event that your guests will rave about for ages. Please call the Director of Catering or Click Here to request more information. Private events Private Events Celebrate your special occasion at Oceanside Country Club. We promise to go above and beyond to personally take care of you and your guests to ensure that you feel welcomed and satisfied. Whether you are planning a wedding, baby shower, meeting, birthday party, golf outing or rehearsal dinner, you will be taken care of by our experienced staff. Our goal is to make planning your event as easy as possible for you and to make you feel like a guest at your own event. Click Here to email for information, or call us Meetings Meetings With an intimate and comfortable meeting space, Oceanside Country Club is the ideal setting to host a meeting for your group. From wireless internet to audio/visual equipment, we have the tools for a successful meeting. Our staff will work with you to ensure that you have everything you need to have an effective and enjoyable event. We can work with you to plan breakfasts, lunches, meeting breaks, cocktail hours and dinners to accompany your meeting. Please Click Here to email us, or call.
